description: When you save a tax return, TurboTax Canada 2024 automatically generates a TT24 file. The file allows you to continue your progress, make edits, and later submit your return electronically or print it for mailing. Common uses for TT24 files include:
By default, TurboTax Canada 2024 stores TT24 files in the following location:
TurboTax Canada uses a year-based file extension naming convention. For example, a 2023 tax return is saved as TT23, while a 2022 return uses TT22.
